column5: I am going to get a second battery for my trolling motor - proguide 55 - what does everyone recomend and should i hook them together as one bank?  Thanks guys appreciate your input
That will work but I would charge them separate unless you have a separate dual bank charger. Did you get my pm about fishing?
If you're going to hook them together you should have two identical batteries... not one old one and one new one.
